about_the_game:
Hathor's Peak is a solitaire-inspired card game that blends strategic with the mystique of ancient Egypt.

Key Features:

  • A Mythical Solitaire Adventure: Combine the strategy of solitaire with the Egyptian mythology. Discover powerful god cards that can transform your game and unlock new strategic possibilities.

  • Dynamic Card Synergies: Each card holds unique powers that can be combined. Uncover rare cards and create game-changing combos to overcome even the toughest challenges.

  • Progressive Difficulty: As you ascend through the peaks, each stage becomes more challenging, demanding clever strategies and quick thinking to prevail.

Key Features:

  • Dynamic Card Synergies: Each card holds unique powers that can be combined. Uncover rare cards and create game-changing combos to overcome even the toughest challenges.

  • Progressive Difficulty: As you ascend through the peaks, each stage becomes more challenging, demanding clever strategies and quick thinking to prevail.
name: Hathor's Peak

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5500
  • Storage: 150 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: Hathor's Peak: The mystical solitaire adventure. Dive into an enchanting Egyptian journey where ancient cards unlock secrets of the pyramids. Master strategic moves, uncover divine powers, and ascend the sacred peaks of Hathor. A captivating blend of solitaire and mythology awaits!
